Description:
Our client is a leading Amusement Park company. They are now looking for a Supervisor Entry Operations to join them. Roles & ResponsibilitiesConducts daily briefings and tracks meeting minutes.
Ensures assigned area is operationally ready for arriving guests by assigned time.
Monitors all employee hours including assigning timed breaks and lunches, ensuring that the operation is covered and all employee required breaks and lunches are issued in a timely manner. Documents any anomalies.
Spot checks all cash handling procedures are being followed and any needed cash pulls are performed.Skills
Skills:
3 years previous supervisory experience in Service/ Entertainment/ Hospitality industry
Ability to handle conflicts and face difficult situations.
Supervisory position leading cash handling staff in the hospitality industry,
Leading a multi-cultural staff

Guest service skills training and certification IAAPA Certifications
Fluent in English
Good Guest and Employee services skills
Proficiency in computer skills
